description: One of my favourite deck builders for a long time. Still holds its own for such a simple deck builder. Spaceships!!!

title: Own the Ap...
description: Own the App only, but play pretty regularly.

title: I purchase...
description: I purchased this on the recommendation of fellow BGG-ers and man, I am THRILLED to have made this purchase. Tactical, strategic, a little cutthroat, and a whole lot of fun. This is my kind of game. The best part, it's less expensive than almost any game I've ever bought(purchased this for ~$10).

title: I purchase...
description: I purchased this on the recommendation of fellow BGG-ers and man, I am THRILLED to have made this purchase. Tactical, strategic, a little cutthroat, and a whole lot of fun. This is my kind of game. The best part, it's less expensive than almost any game I've ever bought(purchased this for ~$10).
Tight little deckbuilder that has expanded a lot over the years.  Have to be honest, the digital version adds a LOT of convenience reshuffling the deck so often, but this is a classic in either form.

title: One of the...
description: One of the simplest and best deck builders out there, solo play works great too, well worth the little money it is

description: One of the simplest and best deck builders out there, solo play works great too, well worth the little money it is

title: Simple and...
description: Simple and fast two-player deck builder. A nice introduction to deck builders, with good art, a solid sci-fi theme and a little strategy. It's not deep, but that's fine.

title: the more I...
description: the more I play this, the more I like it. It is a deck builder with optional tableau building with the bases. The bases are the most genius part of the game.
